channel.title: Woodcutting formulas
channel.description:
Hi, I don't know if this is the right section but...
What things would influence a formula for calculating the time it takes to receive a log, and a tree becoming a stump? I've been searching around but I haven't found anything too informative.
Thanks.

item.title: Woodcutting formulas
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Things that influence it are the type of axe you use, your level and the kind of tree.

Read full topic
